response.overview: Ed Powers Presents COLORS OF PASSION #1. Starring gorgeous Jenny Svenson, Jan Hedlin, Sandra, Christina Love, Ursula Parks, Tanya Hansen, Silk, Mr. X and of course Ed Powers.  This is not your Ed Powers Pro Am gonzo, this is Ed being Oliver Stoned. In the realm of mankind there may come a time when things aren't going right, when life seems like a struggle, when desperate hours arrive. In the life of a struggling artist like Vaughn Von Gustoff things aren't going right. He's in love with a postitute that seems to only want his money. Life seems to be a struggle for him, his art isn't selling. Desperate hours have arrived for him. Living is a passion, passion has many colors. Caught in purgatory, Vaughn is faced with a choice. He is faced with a quest. In the form of a mentor, Ed Powers takes Vaughn on a search for his zest for life. This is a love story, and a sexual adventure! Based on a true story, names have been changed to protect the guilty.
response.title: Colors of Passion 1
